title: Slices of Life - Of The Erotic Persuasion - Kinky Fetishes
description: A compilation of titillating short and to the point 'slices of life', that will have you hungering for more. Nearly everyone has a kink or two that needs release. Or eventually you might discover a certain path you'd like to venture down. Whatever pleases you in an erotic way, might be found among these pages.
author: Mallory West
